pullrequest.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

content.raw:
`UNIT_JointMaker_TEST` and `UNIT_ModelCreator_TEST` fail for me, not sure if it's this PR's fault.

~~~
********* Start testing of JointMaker_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : JointMaker_TEST::initTestCase()
a
SharePercentChange[0.305077] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
ResPercentChange[1.28164]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
PASS   : JointMaker_TEST::JointState()
QFATAL : JointMaker_TEST::CreateRemoveJoint() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : JointMaker_TEST::CreateRemoveJoint() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 2 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of JointMaker_TEST *********
~~~

~~~
********* Start testing of ModelCreator_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : ModelCreator_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : ModelCreator_TEST::SaveState() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
QWARN  : ModelCreator_TEST::SaveState() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
SharePercentChange[0.832756] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[2.67015]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
PASS   : ModelCreator_TEST::SaveState()
QFATAL : ModelCreator_TEST::Selection() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : ModelCreator_TEST::Selection() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 2 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of ModelCreator_TEST *********
~~~

UNIT_JointMaker_TEST and UNIT_ModelCreator_TEST fail for me, not sure if it's this PR's fault.

********* Start testing of JointMaker_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : JointMaker_TEST::initTestCase()

ResPercentChange[1.28164]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
